remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于定义委托事件的类。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以访问的事件类通过指定一个名为子例程**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 期间引发事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 构造对象使用当前并将其传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。The constructs an object using the current and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 可以使用的属性对象提供给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. 如果未指定的值属性期间**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名标识时，才引发事件通过将配置元素设置为`true`。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is by setting the configuration element to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
